subject: Sample code for testing JSP ?
msgSnippet: Could anyone kindly point me to some web-site or provide some sample code which explains testing JSP eith httpunit ? I am pretty new to this but with valuable
messageBody:
Could anyone kindly point me to some web-site or provide some sample
code which explains testing JSP eith httpunit ?

I am pretty new to this but with valuable help from many of you I was
able to test my Java methods using JUnit.

Now I need to test my JSPs and any pointers towards some samples will
be appreciated.

Ours is similar to a shopping cart problem

Thanks
Anand
